item.title: Foreign Investors Can’t Get Enough of the U.S. Bull Market
item.description: Two charts show how overseas capital is driving U.S. markets.

item.title: This Bank Fired Workers and Replaced Them With AI. It Now Says That Was a Huge Mistake
item.description: Turns out, artificial intelligence may not always be as adept as some companies hope.

item.title: How This 28-Year-Old Founder Is Growing His Business By Roasting Tech Bros on LinkedIn
item.description: By posing as a shady tech villain on LinkedIn, Jack Kuveke has earned fans and helped grow a very real startup advisory business.

item.title: Amazon’s Culture Isn’t For Everyone. AWS CEO Matt Garman Explains Why it Has Kept Him at the Company for 20 Years
item.description: Why the next AWS CEO might be a current intern.

item.title: Most Inc. 5000 Companies Use AI for Marketing—But That’s Not the Fastest-Growing Sales Use-Case
item.description: The CEOs at America’s fastest-growing small businesses are overwhelmingly enthusiastic about artificial intelligence.
